title: CNavJ web app
details: Web application that allows to see the recent activity of the "Comit√© Navarro de Jueces de Atletismo", as well as to manage the designations, competitions, etc. It is developed using Angular2, Firebase and Material2.

title: Arduino Bluetooth Car
details: Car designed, assembled and programmed by me with the help of an Arduino board and a bluetooth module. It can be controlled with an Android mobile.
